item.title: Extending the range of a WiFi stick adapter
item.description: I relocated some of my networking gear and by doing that one of my pc’s found itself in a blind spot of the wireless network. I decided to try and see if I can extend the range of the usb wireless adapter it uses. I had a few antennas available but unfortunately the usb adapter didn’t have a connector. I decided to solder the antenna wire directly: First I pried open the usb adapter and located the internal antenna pads.
